name: spo-update-lookup-field
title: Updates a SharePoint Online lookup column to reference a lookup list
shortDescription: Updates a SharePoint Online lookup column to reference a lookup list
longDescription: This script uses PnP PowerShell to update the schema XML of a lookup column in a source list to point to a recreated lookup list by setting or updating the List, WebId, ShowField.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
